comments: A very good approximation is 2e-Pi = ~2.29497100332829723225793155942... - _Marco Matosic_, Nov 16 2005
references: R. Ayoub, An Introduction to the Analytic Theory of Numbers, Amer. Math. Soc., 1963, p. 198-9.
Steven R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge University Press, 2003, Section 5.1 Abelian group enumeration constants, p. 274.

Bernd C. Kellner, On asymptotic constants related to products of Bernoulli numbers and factorials, arXiv:math/0604505.
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Abelian Group
formula: Product of A080729 and A080730. - _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 16 2011
mathematica: p = Product[ N[ Zeta[n], 256], {n, 2, 1000}]; RealDigits[p, 10, 111][[1]] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_ *)
